top_comments_top.body:
As a reminder, this subreddit [is for civil discussion.](/r/politics/wiki/index#wiki_be_civil)

In general, be courteous to others. Debate/discuss/argue the merits of ideas, don't attack people. Personal insults, shill or troll accusations, hate speech, any suggestion or support of harm, violence, or death, and other rule violations can result in a permanent ban. 

If you see comments in violation of our rules, please report them.

 For those who have questions regarding any media outlets being posted on this subreddit, please click [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/politics/wiki/approveddomainslist) to review our details as to our approved domains list and outlet criteria.

***


*I am a bot, and this action was performed automatically. Please [contact the moderators of this subreddit](/message/compose/?to=/r/politics) if you have any questions or concerns.*

Option 1 - continue to allow MPD to strangle people to death in broad daylight and in front of cameras. 

Option 2 - stop MPD from strangling people to death in broad daylight and in front of cameras.

Well I mean the MPD has killed three civilians in recent memory. 

If any other department did that…well nobody would be questioning some *changes* to Sewage or Parks and Rec if they uh…killed unarmed people who posed no threat.

In our reach for safety we have criminalized homelessness, drug addiction, poverty, and mental illness. Conservatives like it this way because while it will hurt some white people it will hurt non-whites more. It's all about maintaining white people in power both economically and politically. So when there is discussion of policing reform they attack it as "defunding" the police or letting criminals run rampant endangering law abiding (white) people. Take the three white men charged with killing a black man when they tried to arrest him. They all pled not guilty and claim they were acting in self-defense. People who are summoned for jury duty won't show up because they are scared what may happen to them or their family. Conservatives are all for law and order until it affects them. Then it's self-defense or some other equally unrealistic excuse.
